tab.name: Options
tab.option: Enter your Open Phacts App ID
Enter your Open Phacts App Key
Select the chemical Identifier to use

tab.name: Search Filters
tab.option: Filter results by Relevance Score. The Relevance Score is part of the Open Phacts Patent Annotation. For more information visit the Open Phacts Support Portal
Filter results by the frequency that a molecule appears in a patent
Filter results by their Patent Classification. For more information visit the Open Phacts Support Portal
Filter results by whether they are found in a particular field of a patent

ports.inPort: Must contain at least one column of valid identifiers (Smiles, InChI, InChI Key)
ports.outPort: Contains rows whose identifiers don't have patents associated with them
Contains rows whose identifiers have patents associated with them, as well as information about those patents
Contains rows that encountered Errors during processing
